1: To the overseer: to David, to bring to remembrance. O God, to deliver me; O Jehovah hasten to help me.
2: They seeking my soul shall be confused and ashamed: they shall be turned away behind; and they desiring my evils, shall be ashamed.
3: They shall be turned back for a reward of their shame, saying, Aha! Aha.
4: All seeking thee shall rejoice and be glad in thee, and they shall say always, God shall be magnified; they loving thy salvation.
5: And I am poor and needy: O God, hasten to me, my help and my deliverer; thou, O Jehovah, wilt not delay.
